definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: He drilled the ball past the pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 他使球越過投手直飛過去。

sentences.english: The two sides are now linked by 558 direct flights per week.
sentences.chinese: 雙方現在通過每週558次直飛航班保持連通。

sentences.english: The rocket then took a lateral course straight for the Moon.
sentences.chinese: 然後，火箭從側面的路線直飛到月球。

sentences.english: The plane flew non-stop from New York to Paris.
sentences.chinese: 那架飛機從紐約直飛巴黎。

sentences.english: Chang'e 2 will fly to the moon directly in a 120-hour journey.
sentences.chinese: 嫦娥二號“將經過120小時的旅程後直飛月球。

sentences.english: He flied non-stop from Beijing to Nanjing to attend an informal dinner party.
sentences.chinese: 他從北京直飛南京就是爲了參加一個非正式的晚宴。

sentences.english: I want to know if there is a non-stop flight from Xiamen to Yinchuan this Monday.
sentences.chinese: 我想知道本週一有沒有從廈門直飛銀川的航班？

sentences.english: He changed his name to Sisco and flew all the way to New York.
sentences.chinese: 他改名爲西斯可，並一路直飛紐約。

sentences.english: We have no non-stop flights to California.
sentences.chinese: 我們沒有直飛加州的班次。

sentences.english: I'll book you on a direct flight to London.
sentences.chinese: 我將爲你預訂直飛倫敦的航班。

sentences.english: The bullet flew to its target and knocked the ashes off the cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 子彈直飛目標，把香菸的灰燼打落了。

sentences.english: He saw that boll fly straint to the man.
sentences.chinese: 他看見那個球向船上那個人直飛過去。

sentences.english: B: If you fly directly, it takes about eighteen hours.
sentences.chinese: 如果直飛的話，大約十八小時。

sentences.english: Is this a continuous flight or is there a layover somewhere ?
sentences.chinese: 這一航班是直飛還是中途有停留呢？

sentences.english: Ms. Booker: No, all flights are direct.
Beijing has also canceled the only direct flights between China and Mexico, a twice-weekly service by Aeromexico.
sentences.chinese: 北京也已經取消了唯一直飛墨西哥每週兩班的航班。

definition: (to take) a turn for the better/to change planes
to pass through a country's territory/transit
to go nonstop to/through (as in "through train")/nonstop
to set off/to start (on a journey)
to open up (windows for air, ideas for discussion, transportation routes etc)
